kgurushankar.shapes

Class Shape2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • kgurushankar.shapes.Shape1D
      • kgurushankar.shapes.Shape2D
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ellipse, Rectangle

    public abstract class Shape2D
extends Shape1D
    Defines a 2D shape that can be filled or unfilled
    Author:
    kgurushankar

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.awt.Color fillColor
      Color this shape will be filled with
      For this shape to be filled, this object cannot be null

      • Fields inherited from class kgurushankar.shapes.Shape1D

        line

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected Shape2D(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2, java.awt.Color c, double strokeWidth)
      Create a Shape2D that has the given coordinates
      protected Shape2D(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2, java.awt.Color edgeColor, double strokeWidth, java.awt.Color fillColor)
      Create a Shape2D that has the given coordinates
      protected Shape2D(java.awt.geom.Point2D start, java.awt.geom.Point2D end, java.awt.Color c, double strokeWidth)
      Create a Shape2D that has the given coordinates
      protected Shape2D(Shape1D shape)
      Copy Constructor
      Can be used to get a different shape with the same defining line
      note that this does not copy fillColor over
      to do that use Shape2D(Shape2D) instead
      protected Shape2D(Shape2D shape)
      Copy Constructor
      Can be used to get a different shape with the same defining line and same fill settings

    • Constructor Detail

      • Shape2D

        protected Shape2D(double x1,
                  double y1,
                  double x2,
                  double y2,
                  java.awt.Color edgeColor,
                  double strokeWidth,
                  java.awt.Color fillColor)
        Create a Shape2D that has the given coordinates
        Parameters:
        x1 - x coordinate of the starting point of the line
        y1 - y coordinate of the starting point of the line
        x2 - x coordinate of the ending point of the line
        y2 - y coordinate of the ending point of the line
        edgeColor - Edge Color of this shape
        strokeWidth - weight of the line this shape will be drawn with
        fillColor - color this shape will be filled with

      • Shape2D

        protected Shape2D(Shape1D shape)
        Copy Constructor
        Can be used to get a different shape with the same defining line
        note that this does not copy fillColor over
        to do that use Shape2D(Shape2D) instead
        Parameters:
        shape - shape to copy data from
